function_reachability: Is it impossible for function 'fn1' to reach function 'fn2'?
Is it impossible for function 'fn1' to reach function 'main'?
loop_reachability: Can the loop with condition 'k < 6' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'k < 6' always executed?
Can the loop with condition '1' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition '1' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'k < 6' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition '1' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Is variable 'a (line 1)' used after its definition?
Is variable 'b (line 1)' used after its definition?
liveness: Is variable 'p' live at the end of function 'fn1'?
Is variable 'k' live at the end of function 'fn2'?
dead_code: Can the program actually reach the statement: “static void fn2 ()”?
